post.body: It's a wet day in LA but all is well. Will be balancing home/work life today since kids are home. Sure, let's chat. Wed/Thurs?
Blizzard! Aackk! I haven't been in a Blizard since the 80's. Don't think I could take it now. It's raining like crazy here.
Enjoy that FABULOUS Tortola weather!Youre missing a MAJOR storm in LA/OC. =)
I'm MMMMMEEEEEELLLLTING! Haven't seen this much rain since the late 90's!...and it's cold too :( Stay warm. Be Safe.
Hi Ron! I just sent our friend @websucessdiva a tweet. Thx for lookin out! Hope ur having a gr8 morning so far...
Good Morning beautiful! Hope you're having a Happy Monday.
I think the bloggers in Austin are keeping it's coolness on the "Down Low." It'd ruin everything if EVERYONE knew it was #1 =)
Were YOU the one crying and screaming? I do sometimes... =)
Thx! Me doin the robot? Might happen...I get bored and there's no shortage of foolishness in my profession! =) How R U doing?
U know it! PLENTY of blessings 4 all. Looking forward to catchin up with you. Any friend of @successfool is a friend o mine! =)
No heat in NH? Holy cow...Are you and the fam ok?
Ahhh. Steve you know our Friend always plans the AMAZING! I'm just trying to live according to that plan...
ABSOLUTELY! The good news flows both ways. I listened 2 ur "Best of " Radio wrap up & was inspired. Look 4ward 2 connecting.
Great quote Wendy! I'm planning an AMAZING week. I wish the same for you and yours =)
I'm originally from NYC but have been in LA for years. My grandparents were from Venezuela and Puerto Rico.
FAB!Tal you then ;)
we can do 10 am if that makes it easier on you...
I know Sadie's up at 6!
Considering most of the news in the ad market has been dismal, it's good news! How are you?
Yep. What time? Can we do like 9am?
Love the accent Ewan!
It's wild that ure enjoying ur Sunday & I'm not done w/Sat night! LIfe is really good. Abt 2 make dinner & watch videos w/fam.
Hello 2 you too. How's it going?
Yes I'm on Youtube: http://is.gd/cKm8 or http://is.gd/cKoq I've got a couple more but these R main. Thx 4 asking. What about U?
So excited to shoot some video this week . Gr8 people and ideas coming together. Now we just need the sun to shine again here in LA...
RT @ifeelgod: Dont wait for better circumstances to rejoice - rejoice in the Lord alway, again I say rejoice!
Free, Green and Potentially viral! Youtube Holiday Video Greeting Card: This one is a no brainer. Check out ht.. http://tinyurl.com/6krabl
As Online Video Viewing Shifts From PC to TV Screen, Viewers Will Number Nearly One Billion by 2013: http://snipr.com/81un9 Woot!
Online video providers get boost from mail partner http://is.gd/bzUB
HGTV Redesigned Web site enhances user experience, easier navigation and expanded video. http://jijr.com/6ef
Happy Sunday! Off to enjoy this beautiful day with family and friends. Be Blessed...
G'night Tweeps!
RT @blogtoitnew: mashable : Twitter, We Are Poking You To Fix Your Facebook App - http://blog.to.it/node/4073
Call for nominations! Streamy Awards to Recognizeand Honor Outstanding Achievement in Web Television: http://is.gd/cTF9
Video searches on Google's YouTube accounted for one-quarter of all Google search queries in the U.S. http://is.gd/cXRS
Good morning everyone! Going to work 1/2 day today so I can spend the rest of the day w/kids. Yay!
RT me: Venture Capital Firm Uses Online Video To Deliver Topical, Hopeful Holiday Card That's Going Viral: http://tinyurl.com/4z5uu8
Unwinding from a busy weekend. Sleep well my friends. Good night...
Ad spending for online video, which makes up 2% of internet ad revenue, is expected to quadruple by 2011 to $1.9 billion: http://is.gd/cTCq
The OverView - Episode 10: The OverView, and Amber, comes to you this week from sunny Florida. In this episode: .. http://tinyurl.com/7sgnk2
